pullrequest.title: Added ability to restore UI state

content.raw: They should. Also, they probably already have one - the default labconfig file (which exists in the installer repository) has one as this feature was planned but never implemented. The path specified is a silly one, but we should leave it since we shouldn't be changing people's labconfig files on them - but I'll set it in the installer to be in the default app_saved_configs folder so it will be more sensible for future installs.
